name: Legerdemain
description: Illusion, sleight of hand, and telekinesis.

name: Contract
description: Oaths have always been of paramount importance to the fae. Legends speak of ages past, when reality bowed to the least whims of the lords of Arcadia, and the Dreaming served as the medium for tests of will between fae magicians. In such a wild age, the only constants among the fae were those promises to which they bound themselves, and those agreements they entered into and sealed with Glamour.

name: Primal
description: Mastery of the elements and the natural world.

name: Winter
description: Cold, ice, and the death of emotion.

name: Fae
description: Manipulate fae creatures and their realms.

name: Aquis
description: Aquis is the Sliver particularly practiced by the Ondines. The Inanimae who practices its arts learns to control water and tie into its connections to the mind, time, and keeping the peace. Those who learn its ways immediately learn to breathe and travel underwater as easily as they do on land.

name: Petros
description: Petros is the Sliver particularly practiced by the Glomes. It allows the Inanimae wielding it to master stone, earth, and ores as well as the concepts of Strength and Endurance. Any Inanimae learning this Sliver immediately gains the ability to climb any rocky surface so long as their is at least a hint of hand or toe holds. (Difficulty reduced by 4).

name: Pyros
description: Pyros is the Sliver of Fire and the plaything of the Solimonds. Its wielders also gain the ability to manipulate emotions and even create them at higher levels. Those who learn this way of magic gain the ability to create small fires with the snap of a finger.

name: Stratus
description: The specialty of the Parosemes, Stratus is the Sliver of the Air as well as travel and illusions. The Fae learning its ways learns to predict the weather with a Perception + Kenning roll with a difficulty of 5, knowing the weather 1 day in advance per success.

name: Verdage
description: Verdage is the Sliver particularly practiced by the Kuberas. It is about the nurture and control of the natural environment and the ties that bind all of life together. Any Inanimae learning this Sliver can identify any plant species and know a little about it by rolling Perception + Verdage.

name: Infusion
description: Given sufficient training and materials any changeling can potentially craft all manner of chimerical wonders or even forge astounding Treasures, but those who delve into the magic of Infusion learn how to manipulate the very nature of such objects in ways that cause even seasoned makers to sit up and take notice. As the nockers who pioneered this Art might put it, learning Infusion won't make you a better crafter, but even just mastering some of its basic cantrips opens up a wealth of options and shortcuts that other crafters simply don't have. At its higher levels, Infusion allows a changeling to store precious Glamour for later use, transform items with a touch, and even create sentient chimerical life.

name: Kryos
description: Ice isn't nearly so feared on land as it is in the water, but it can often spell death for the mer. Although this Art was created by the mer, trolls who witness its ice-sculpting beauty often beg to be taught its ways. Its beauty has a double edge to changelings, who sense its connection to the forces of Banality- immobility, rigidity, crystalline symmetry- all too readily

name: Storm Craft
description: Since the dawn of time, humankind has made offerings to the gods before undergoing an aquatic journey of any sort. The Changelings who know Storm Craft (referred to previously as 'Skycraft' in the book Blood Dimmed Tides), protect it well as they understand the power of this potent Art. Masters of Storm Craft can control the storms that whip the seas into a frenzy and through this, the lives of whoever mayb be traveling there.
